title: Pope Francis and President Biden to Meet as Both Face Abortion Tensions With U.S. Bishops
content:
1. Pope Francis and President Biden to Meet as Both Face Abortion Tensions With U.S. Bishops  The Wall Street Journal

  4. When Biden meets with Francis, some heads will explode  National Catholic Reporter

localize.title: フランシスコ法王とバイデン大統領が会談、米国司教団との中絶問題で対立
